verses.verse: <S%H310>After<s%> this it happened that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H1732>them:<s%> and David <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4965>bridle<s%> of the mother city out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

He <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> them with the <S%H2256>line,<s%> making them to lie <S%H7901>down<s%> on the <S%H776>ground;<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2256>lines<s%> to put to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and one <S%H4393>full<s%> <S%H2256>line<s%> to keep <S%H2421>alive.<s%> The <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> became <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H4503>tribute.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> also <S%H1909>Hadadezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7340>Rehob,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah,<s%> as he <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7725>recover<s%> his <S%H3027>dominion<s%> at <S%H6578>the<s%> <S%H5104>River.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> from him one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>footmen:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6131>hamstrung<s%> all the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H3498>horses,<s%> but reserved of them for one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots.<s%>

When the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H1909>Hadadezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H5333>garrisons<s%> in <S%H758>Syria<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus;<s%> and the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> became <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H4503>tribute.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> gave <S%H3467>victory<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> wherever he <S%H1980>went.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7982>shields<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> that were on the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H1909>Hadadezer,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
When <S%H8583>Toi<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5221>struck<s%> all the <S%H2428>army<s%> of <S%H1909>Hadadezer,<s%>

then <S%H8583>Toi<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3141>Joram<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> to <S%H7592>Greet<s%> <S%H1288>him,<s%> and to bless <S%H3898>him,<s%> because he had fought against <S%H1909>Hadadezer<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H1909>him:<s%> for Hadadezer had <S%H376>wars<s%> with <S%H8583>Toi.<s%> Joram brought with <S%H3027>him<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass:<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> also <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> these to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> with the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> that he <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which he <S%H3533>subdued;<s%>

of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> and of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and of <S%H6002>Amalek,<s%> and of the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H1909>Hadadezer,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7340>Rehob,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6213>earned<s%> a <S%H8034>reputation<s%> when he <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H5221>smiting<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> in the <S%H1516>Valley<s%> of <S%H4417>Salt,<s%> even <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> thousand <S%H505>men.<s%>

He <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H5333>garrisons<s%> in <S%H123>Edom;<s%> throughout all <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> he <S%H5333>garrisons,<s%> and all the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> became <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> gave <S%H3467>victory<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> wherever he <S%H1980>went.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H6666>justice<s%> and <S%H4941>righteousness<s%> to all his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> was over the <S%H6635>army;<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H286>Ahilud<s%> was <S%H2142>recorder;<s%>

and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> and <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar,<s%> were <S%H3548>priests;<s%> and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> was <S%H5608>scribe;<s%>

and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> was over the <S%H3774>Cherethites<s%> and the <S%H6432>Pelethites;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> were chief <S%H3548>ministers.<s%>
